mapper.select: SELECT PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_SNAPSHT as "snapsht", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", count(B.PCOMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ

SELECT PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_SNAPSHT as "snapsht", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", count(B.PCOMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ WHERE PROJ_SEQ > #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ ORDER BY PROJ_SEQ ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_SNAPSHT as "snapsht", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", count(B.PCOMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PCOMT_PROJ_SEQ WHERE PROJ_SEQ < #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ ORDER BY PROJ_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT (PROJ_TITLE, PROJ_SUBTITLE, PROJ_DESC, PROJ_CONTENTS, PROJ_SNAPSHT, PROJ_SOURCECD, PROJ_DEVELOPER, PROJ_HITS) VALUES (#{title}, #{subtitle}, #{desc}, #{contents}, #{snapsht}, #{sourcecode},#{developer}, #{hits})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PTFOLIO_PROJECT SET PROJ_TITLE = #{title}, PROJ_SUBTITLE = #{subtitle}, PROJ_DESC = #{desc}, PROJ_CONTENTS = #{contents}, PROJ_SNAPSHT = #{snapsht}, PROJ_SOURCECD = #{sourcecode}, PROJ_DEVELOPER = #{developer}, PROJ_HITS = #{hits} WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{seq}
